term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - reactive polymer processing
term.title: reactive polymer processing

item.text: Process whereby a polymericmonolith is produced through an in-situpolymerization or polymer modification reaction.

notes.item: The polymerization or modification reaction and the transformation of the resulting polymer into a shaped product is accomplished in the same processing equipment.
This type of processing is commonly accomplished by extrusion or injection moulding.
Reaction injection moulding and reinforced reaction injection moulding are types of reactive polymer processing.
